channel.title: NPCScripter v.0.3 beta
channel.description:
This is made for xEnts bsh scripting system, it was made because of boredom and learning purposes. took about 2-4 hours to make gui and all that.
I tried to make it as perfect as possible, but still keeping it simple. I will continue to make this even better and quicker to use.
Log: [code] v.0.3 -Added value inserting when pressing button -Fixed bug where program didn't close properly. [/code]
Picture: [img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/705/gayn.jpg[/img]
Please tell me how should i improve this or what features you want to see, Also report bugs.
File attached.

item.title: NPCScripter v.0.3 beta
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

The script language is so quick and easy that I actually think I could type quicker than I could find the program, open it up, click buttons and shit. Baring in mind you need to type for pretty much every button click anyway. Just my opinion of course. Good job regardless, I guess.

Learning purposes mate:)

EDIT:Updated program little bit

EDIT2:

Zilent:

It’s good to see some development. When you nest your control structures it can get a bit involved keeping track of the recursion that must happen in your generation code. If you get stuck let me know and I can give you some hints. I see your interface doesn’t have a (visible) structure for containing the various controls that you use (PlayerTalk, etc). To accomplish this you might want to use a Tree structure for quick editing and just dump the tree into your text box upon demand. That’s what the RSCD scripter that I wrote did.

This is really simply written, won’t give the source out yet, but i copy some stuff of it here so you understand how simple and ugly it is.

Decided to release source.
As you can see i didn’t put much effort in it, but it works.

Read full topic
